paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Advocacy
detailsData.content: Over 30 years of experience providing strong advocacy to clients in San Diego and throughout California.

detailsData.title: Proven Track Record
detailsData.content: Over 140 settlements and verdicts exceeding $1 million each, the most in San Diego.

detailsData.title: Elite Legal Services
detailsData.content: Recognized for excellence and reputation for successful outcomes in personal injury and business litigation.

subHeading: San Diego Personal Injury & Business Litigation Attorneys
valueProp: The McClellan Law Firm provides strong advocacy to personal injury and business litigation clients in San Diego. With over 30 years of experience, we have a reputation for excellence and successful outcomes.

testimonalData.text: The McClellan Law Firm provided exceptional legal services and achieved a successful outcome for my case.
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend The McClellan Law Firm for their professionalism and dedication to their clients.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: Craig McClellan and his team are true experts in personal injury law, and I am grateful for their representation.
testimonalData.author: Alice Johnson
